trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for filter controls.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for filter-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The QueryableFilterUserControl class is the base class for user controls that render filters that can be plugged into the Dynamic Data filtering framework that is based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> class.
trans-unit.target: Klassen QueryableFilterUserControl er basisklasse for brukerkontroller som gjengir filtre som kan kobles til et dynamisk filtrering rammeverk som er basert på <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>

trans-unit.source: Implementers must override the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.GetQueryable%2A> control, which can return a modified <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that reflects the filter's state.
trans-unit.target: Implementerere må overstyre den <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.GetQueryable%2A>kontrollen, som kan returnere en endrede <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet som gjenspeiler av filteret tilstand.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.GetQueryable%2A>

trans-unit.source: The base class contains helper methods for building LINQ expression trees.
trans-unit.target: Basisklassen inneholder helper metoder for å bygge trær for LINQ-uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den transformerte <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet fra datakilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Kilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The value for the `propertyName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den `propertyName` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Den transformerte <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet fra datakilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the column to use for filtering.
trans-unit.target: Henter kolonnen for filtrering.

trans-unit.source: The column to use for filtering.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen for filtrering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default values that are mapped for the table.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardverdiene som er tilordnet for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: By default, Dynamic Data provides Boolean, foreign-key, and enumeration filter templates.
trans-unit.target: Som standard dynamiske dataene gir Boolean, sekundærnøkkel og opplisting filter maler.

trans-unit.source: The default values that are mapped for the table.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier som er tilordnet for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default values that are mapped for the table.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardverdiene som er tilordnet for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The default values that are mapped for the table.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdier som er tilordnet for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.OnFilterChanged*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.OnFilterChanged*>-metoden.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.OnFilterChanged*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data control that handles the filter inside the filter template.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakontrollen som behandler filteret i filtermalen.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if the filter template does not override it.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis filtermalen ikke overstyre den.

trans-unit.source: The data control that handles the filter.
trans-unit.target: Datakontrollen som behandler filteret.

trans-unit.source: Gets the transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den transformerte <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet fra datakilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method if you derive a control from <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl>.
trans-unit.target: Du må implementere denne metoden hvis du avledet en kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl>.</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl>

trans-unit.source: The source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Kilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
trans-unit.target: Den transformerte <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet fra datakilden <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> </xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.FilterChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.FilterChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Call this method when the filter selection has changed in order to notify the data source that the query must be re-run.
trans-unit.target: Kalle denne metoden når det merkede området filteret er endret for å varsle datakilden som spørringen må kjøres på nytt.

trans-unit.source: Populates a list control with all the foreign-key elements or Boolean elements in the table.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut kontroll for en liste med alle sekundærnøkkel elementer eller boolsk elementer i tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Foreign-key columns are populated with elements from the foreign-key table.
trans-unit.target: Ekstern-nøkkelkolonner er fylt med elementer fra tabellen sekundærnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Boolean columns are populated with "All", "True", and "False".
trans-unit.target: Boolsk kolonner blir fylt ut "All", "True" og "False".

trans-unit.source: A list control.
trans-unit.target: Kontroll for en liste.
